Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill allows you to interact with STVS kitchen devices.
It requires a dedicated STVS material available on demand at:
https://www.st.com/content/st_com/en/stm32-alexa-voice.html

This skill understands commands based on English language.

To try this skill, clik the 'Enable' button in Alexa App.

During activation process, you will need to perform an account linking between your Alexa application and your Amazon account.
A new window will appear during account link that will ask you to
"Click 'Allow' to sign in to ST_VS4I"

Then in Alexa application, allow 'Discover devices' option after enabling the skill.
You will then get 3 new devices in your device list that you can control independantly.
These 3 kitchen devices are:

- HOOD:
The Fan Speed can be controlled by voice. The range value is from 1 to 5.
For instance, to set the fan speed to 4, just say:
'Alexa, set fan speed to 4'.

- KITCHEN LIGHT
To control the state of the kitchen light, just say:
'Alexa, turn on the light". 
It will switch on the light.
or
'Alexa turn off the light".
It will switch off the light

- OVEN
Oven temperature can be controlled by voice. The range value is from 0 to 250 degres.
For instance, to set the thermostat at 200 degres, please say:
'Alexa, set the oven at 200 degres'.

To share your feedback, you can contact us at: dev.stvs@st.com
